response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance your business operations. Given its exceptional value and the benefits it offers, we are offering it to you at a special introductory price of $950,000. This is a limited-time offer designed to recognize your early interest and commitment to excellence in your field. Please let us know if you would like to proceed with this exclusive deal.", "product_price": 950000}
